name: Aaaaahrena
description:
A small local VS game for 2 players.

Controlls:

Fitz

Movement - W,A,D

Shooting - C

Grumpel

Movement : Arrowkeys

Shooting : enter

Music & SFX by Hardw1red

Update 2ß15-06-03

- fixed another double music bug

Update 2ß15-06-01

- fixed bug which played both songs after returning to the menu

- added collision between fitz and grumpels bullets

Update 2ß15-05-31

- NOW with music and sounds!

- added some indicator when ammo runs out.

- added the possibility to go back to the menu from the game screen (esc)
